mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(t.BIZ_DATE) AS id, SUM(t.PERF_ACPH) AS perfAcph, SUM(t.PERF_TOTAL) AS perfTotal FROM mkt_stf_perf t WHERE YEAR(t.BIZ_DATE) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND STAFF_ID = #{staffId} GROUP BY MONTH(t.BIZ_DATE)

SELECT t.TASK_NAME AS taskName, CASE t.TASK_STATUS WHEN '1' THEN t.PERF_TOTAL * 0.25 WHEN '2' THEN t.PERF_TOTAL * 0.5 WHEN '3' THEN t.PERF_TOTAL * 0.75 END AS perfAlready, t.PERF_TOTAL AS perfTotal FROM MKT_TASK_INFO t WHERE t.TASK_TYPE = '1' AND t.TASK_STATUS != '4' AND t.STAFF_ID = #{staffId} ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT t.CUST_NO AS custNo, c.SHORT_NAME AS custName, t.THAN_M_AMT AS thanMAmt FROM pub_dps_chg_staff t LEFT JOIN cust_base_info c ON c.CUST_NO = t.CUST_NO WHERE STAFF_ID = #{staffId} ORDER BY t.THAN_M_AMT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT t.CUST_NO AS custNo, c.SHORT_NAME AS custName, t.THAN_M_AMT AS thanMAmt FROM pub_loan_chg_staff t LEFT JOIN cust_base_info c ON c.CUST_NO = t.CUST_NO WHERE STAFF_ID = #{staffId} ORDER BY t.THAN_M_AMT DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cust_busi_info UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mkt_task_info WHERE STAFF_ID = #{staffId} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mkt_task_info WHERE TASK_STATUS = '4' AND STAFF_ID = #{staffId}

( SELECT p.STAFF_ID AS STAFF_ID, s.STAFF_NAME AS staffName, SUM(p.PERF_ACPH) AS PERF_ACPH FROM mkt_stf_perf p LEFT JOIN sys_staff s ON s.STAFF_ID = p.STAFF_ID WHERE MONTH (p.BIZ_DATE) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m') AND p.STAFF_ID != #{staffId} GROUP BY p.STAFF_ID ORDER BY SUM(p.PERF_ACPH) DESC LIMIT 4 ) UNION ALL SELECT t.STAFF_ID AS id, s.STAFF_NAME AS staffName, SUM(t.PERF_ACPH) AS perfAcph FROM mkt_stf_perf t LEFT JOIN sys_staff s ON s.STAFF_ID = t.STAFF_ID WHERE MONTH (t.BIZ_DATE) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m') AND t.STAFF_ID = #{staffId}
SELECT t.MSG_CONTENT FROM pub_poit_msg t WHERE t.MSG_TYPE = '1' AND t. STATUS = '2' AND t.CREATE_USER = #{staffId} ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 3
